text: Ke kaloku bacengcelezele iindaba zikaNûh xa wathi kubantu bakubo: “Hini na bantu bakuthi, ukuba ngaba ukuhlala kwam (nani), nokunikhumbuza kwam ngeeVesi zika-Allâh kuyaninzimela, mna ke ndibeka ithemba lam kuAllâh. Qulunqani icebo lenu ke, nina ndawonye namahlulelane enu, nize nenze elo cebo lenu lingabi nakuthandabuzeka kuni, nize kananjalo niwise isigwebo senu kum, ningandimeli nokundimela
